long_description: UGG Scuff slippers for men are a simple solution when colder temperatures come creeping inside; just slip them on to keep your feet warm and happy until spring returns. Suede leather uppers lend sophisticated, understated style. Breathable and moisture-wicking sheepskin shearling linings let air circulate around feet in both warm and cool temperatures. Slip-on style of the Ugg Scuff helps prevent overheating and offers easy on-and-off. Soft rubber outsoles overlaid with suede logo pattern make these indoor slippers quiet around the house so nothing disturbs the stillness of a winter morning.
short_description: UGG Scuff slippers for men are a simple solution when colder temperatures come creeping inside; just slip them on to keep your feet warm and happy until spring returns.
